about_the_game:
Earth, 22?? AD - Katherine is a scientist-engineer and martial artist. Wielding her shinken, she sets off on a personal quest to avenge her own injustice soon after Project Omega laid off her prodigious partner.

A gamified version of samurai sword fighting art, Overdeveloped: Requiem is a retro Action-Adventure Platformer where you need to take your time, analyze the situation and build your opportunity to take on enemies accordingly.

To score higher, you must use the perfect fit sword technique for each situation. This is crucial to recover your energy and moving on to the next challenge.

Beat evil robotic security machines and make your way into the core the place you used to work for, to face your ultimate trial, and triumph.

Help Katherine in her quest for justice. Will you be able to take your revenge on human reckless greed and selfish pride?

Set a few years before the events in Overdeveloped (a game by team Dizzy Barracuda Digital, for the Game Design Program at Vancouver Film School), witness the origins of Overdeveloped Saga beginning with the downfall of Project Omega and its evil experiments.
